name: LoopRunner (Zarki, Sombrerow, CocoMendes)
description:
Your goal is to reach the door at the end of the castle maze. Careful, you'll need the key first! and you'll probably loop back around once or twice before you get it right ;)

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right

Spacebar: Jump

Z: Dash

Screenshots coming soon! Just enjoying being done for the moment
